name: Survive Dio and Jotaro Chibi
description: Giorno Giovanna, the boss of the Italian mafia "Passione" was hired by Dio to program a video game, but Dio doesn't pay him XDxdXdxD, and something is wrong at Giorno's workplace ... Well, there are some cute creatures, but they are not as innocent as it seems, and Giorno will have to avoid these creatures at all costs. in the game there is no limit, since it is done in power point so you can not do anything but play and voila
